alert.note: Alert for Mason (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 21 at 3:32PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: .The Skokomish River will continue to rise this evening through tonight due to heavy rainfall in the Olympic Region. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Washington, including the following county, Mason. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
